# remove(named:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a geometric pin with the given name from this entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func remove(named name: String)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name of the geometric pin to remove.

## Discussion

If found, the pin is removed from the entity’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GeometricPinsComponent]. There is no effect if no matching [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/GeometricPin] is found.
